channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI video slop is everywhere, take our quiz to try and spot it
item.description: There's no one way to be absolutely sure about a video's authenticity, but experts say there are some simple clues that can help.

item.title: The Shocking Crash That Led Marin County to Reckon With the Dangers of E-Bikes
item.description: Unregulated e-bikes are a growing danger on American streets. In one Bay Area town, a terrible accident finally led to reform.

item.title: Rubio and Witkoff are meeting with Ukraine's negotiators in Florida as Trump pushes to broker a deal
item.description: Top Trump administration officials are meeting Ukrainian negotiators in Florida this weekend, pushing to broker an end to Russia's war in Ukraine.

item.title: Netanyahu Asks Israel’s President to Pardon Him in Corruption Cases
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu made the contentious appeal weeks after President Trump had made the same request to the Israeli president.

item.title: Glenn Close, Ethan Hawke and Others Mourn Tom Stoppard
item.description: Nobody advanced or cherished the English language more than Stoppard, Tim Curry noted. Colleagues and fans agreed.
